Posts.Content: Jul 26, 2011 09:11AM Deb74 wrote: I'm scheduled for a UMX on August 2. I have DCIS and will not need chemo or radiation unless something shows up in the sentinel node biopsy. It will be skin sparing with a tissue expander inserted at surgery. I had lung cancer surgery last Sept. also on the right side. I'm "only" 54 and never had stitches or a broken bone until cancer reared it's ugly head. Sounds like your life has taken many twists and turns in the past few months. What a difficult journey. Good luck to you!
Posts.Title: August 2011 Surgery Group blondelawyer Joan811
